headline: NetApp’s Q1 Earnings Call: Our Top 5 Analyst Questions
summary: NetApp’s first quarter results reflected solid revenue growth and operational discipline, exceeding Wall Street’s expectations for both sales and non-GAAP earnings. Management identified strong demand for all-flash storage systems and expansion in public cloud services as the main drivers of performance. CEO George Kurian noted, “We gained almost 300 basis points of all-flash market share in calendar 2024, more than any other vendor as reported by IDC.” The company also highlighted accelerating
